there was petrified wood laying on the ground .
output.sentences: The southwest has beautiful summer weather and gorgous vistas.
We decided to go for a walk in the desert.
Andrew found a piece of petrified wood that was laying in the sand.
We saw nothing living, and yet the air seemed to pulse with energy.
We were moved to see ruins from past civilizations as we walked along.
